author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

In PRs involving the phase-2 HLT menu development, it is useful to test the whole set of available process modifiers acting on the menu. 
I create a predefined user list called `ph2_hlt` that contains all the process-modified workflows relevant for the phase-2 HLT menu that can be used to run tests via `runTheMatrix.py -l ph2_hlt `.
Also none of these workflows is run in the IB matrix, while it would be useful to have them in order to spot issues, thus I also add them to the IB matrix.

#### PR validation:

` runTheMatrix.py -l ph2_hlt --show` produces:

```console

processing relval_highstats
processing relval_pileup
processing relval_generator
processing relval_extendedgen
processing relval_production
processing relval_ged
ignoring relval_upgrade from default matrix
ignoring relval_cleanedupgrade from default matrix
ignoring relval_gpu from default matrix
processing relval_2017
processing relval_Run4
ignoring relval_identity from default matrix
processing relval_machine
processing relval_premix
processing relval_nano
ignoring relval_data_highstats from default matrix

found a total of  1275  workflows:
      of which the following 11 were selected:
29634.75 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33Timing_Run4D110+HARVESTGlobal_HLT75e33Timing_Run4D110 
29634.751 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33TimingAlpaka_Run4D110+HARVESTGlobal_HLT75e33TimingAlpaka_Run4D110

29634.754 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33TimingAlpakaSingleIterLST_Run4D110+HARVESTGlobal_HLT75e33TimingAlpakaSingleIterLST_Run4D110 
29634.755 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33TimingAlpakaLST_Run4D110+HARVESTGlobal_HLT75e33TimingAlpakaLST_Run4D110 
29634.756 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33TimingTrimmedTracking_Run4D110+HARVESTGlobal_HLT75e33TimingTrimmedTracking_Run4D110
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, not meant to be backported.
title: Introduce `ph2_hlt` predefined workflow list
